tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review:
Dr. Mehek is very patient & professional.
Thank you for making my smile brighter & healthier. Here's to more years of great dental health under your watchful care!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: It was my first visit for removal of a tooth of my young kid. We spent hardly 15mins at the clinic and that was the main attraction that you dont have any waiting time. The procedure was quick and professional. my kid was happy and almost didn't felt it. Absolute covid precautions followed and even kids are provided with proper sanitization and gloves in that sense. Doctor was keen to follow up. I will surely recommend everyone to atleast visit once for all your dental problems and you will surely recommend others. Thanks to Dr.Mehak.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr Mehak Gupta knows her job. Very polite. Professionalism 100 percent. Went with lot of pain. Not bearable. Within an hour it settled. Very happy overall. Keep up the good work Dr Gupta.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Doctor is highly experienced and skilled. She explained about my dental issue( Implant, cavity fillings)thoroughly. Clinic is very  hygienic. No wait time. I visited this clinic for my mother (wusdom tooth extraction)also. Doctor makes us comfortable then start with treatment. She follows up on regular basis.
Great experience. I strongly recommend smirk dental clinic.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,

review:

She was gentle and took her time I didnt feel rushed 
Most of all very strict  hygiene covid protocols were followed .
Overall satisfied will definetly revommend it.
Thank you
